name: Klotski.
description:
Klotski, is an simple but addictive puzzle game. We well-design 406 puzzle levels, although the game size is around 3 megabyte, we believe it will bring you over 3 hours' interesting time.

Your target is to rescue the red block out of surrounds. It's an challenge task!

If you are interested in this game, please give us some reviews, and check our other puzzle games in https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/an-zhuona/id1262294397

More feedbacks, please email to azhuona@gmail.com
